members.name: Naoyuki Kawakita
members.desc: Giang brings over 25 years of Hakuhodo excellence, steering success across FMCG, Electronics, and Automobile sectors with a keen understanding of Vietnamese culture. His leadership and proactive mindset are pivotal, mentoring our client service teams and the entire Hakuhodo Vietnam Group. Giang’s strategic vision and experience ensure unmatched results for our clients, driving market success and setting industry standards.
